events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will review your resume carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the Software Engineering department for further consideration.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the recruitment process.
We conducted an initial screening interview to understand your experience and skills related to software development.
Thank you for your prompt response and for providing additional details about your software engineering background.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior developers next week to assess your programming skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and coding knowledge.
We have arranged the HR interview to discuss company culture, benefits, and answer any questions you may have.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed enthusiasm for the role and alignment with our company values.
We have extended a formal job offer for the Software Engineer position including compensation and benefits details.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
You officially accepted the job offer, confirming your intent to join as a Software Engineer starting next month.
Your onboarding process has started, including orientation and setup of development tools and access credentials.
All recruitment formalities are complete and you have officially joined the engineering team at the company.
